translations: n.皮塔饼（一种空心圆面包）

phrs.translation: 八色鸫属, 品牌, 火型

sentences.sentence: Still walking up to the village to get a grilled halloumi pitta for breakfast though!
sentences.translation: 但我还是为了一份烤芝士皮塔饼的早餐步行至乡村！

sentences.sentence: One man waited for five hours, only to buy one packet of pitta bread to feed his large family for a day.
sentences.translation: 一个男人为了买一袋皮塔面包排了五个小时的队，那是他们一个大家庭一天的火食。

sentences.sentence: A pitta, an internationally endangered bird, found on a mountain on Goje island, South Gyeongsang province, South Korea.
sentences.translation: 在韩国南庆尚省Goje岛的一座山上，人们终于一睹八色鸟这一国际濒危鸟类的芳容。
